app.name: HestiaLabs Experiences
app.description: We create a new relationship to personal data

base-button-share.error-sharing-not-supported: Your system does not support sharing files
base-button-share.error-sharing-failed: We apologize, but the sharing operation failed for an unknown reason. Please try again later.
base-button-share.quote-to-share-default: Analyze the data collected on you
base-button-share.quote-to-share-experience: Analyze the data collected on you by {experienceTitle}

data-validator.invalid-format: Data in this format cannot be displayed in a table

sankey.hoverMessage: hover on the links or nodes to get more information about the most frequent ones

top-row.heading: In total we found {total} {countLabel} between {minDate} and {maxDate}

generic-map.search-info: Please use the search box and filters below to change what is shown on the map.

unit-files-dialog.title: Expected files
unit-files-dialog.no-files: No specific files are used in these experiences.
unit-files-dialog.all-files-2: , all JSON/CSV files provided will be analysed for dates and geographical coordinates. These experiences will be more interesting the more files you include.

select-files-dialog.title: Select files
select-files-dialog.label: Search for files
select-files-dialog.placeholder: Enter part of a file name...

unit-summary.cardTitle: Here's a summary of what we have found

load-data.name: Load your data
load-data.title: Analyse your private data
load-data.disclaimer: Unless explicitly consented in the "Share My Data" tab, no data is transmitted to HestiaLabs or anyone else. The whole experience takes place locally in the browser and nothing is left behind as soon as you close the tab.
load-data.text-default: Explore the structure and contents of your files.
load-data.text: to request the private data that has been collected about you. Once you receive it, analyse it here.

file-explorer.name: Files
file-explorer.title: File Explorer
file-explorer.select: Select a file on the left panel to see it in more details here

csv.errorText: Could not parse the file. Please use the "RAW" tab to visualise it.

json.errorText: Could not parse the file. Please use the "RAW" tab to visualise it.
json.found-items-header: Found items (click to show in tree)

schema.errorText: Could not find a schema for this file, please contact us if you need it.
schema.invalid-paths: Impossible to create a table with these accessors, there are several divergent tables.

click-graph: Please click on the graph to apply filters.
directed-graph-disclaimer: Please take into account the fact that this graph only shows the link between data flows that are tagged as Fingerprinting or Advertising.
filter-info: Any filtering you do will also limit what data is shared into the pool if you share this tab on the 'Share My Data' tab.
footer-digipower-academy: The Digipower.academy has emerged out of projects initiated separately by
no-records: No records were found in your file(s).
select-time-range: Select a time range to zoom in
